ranks.text: After clearing the Bank Palace dungeon in the story, find Makoto in front of the Student Council Office at school. Rank 3 (Scholarly) Knowledge is required. Rnlocks Shadow Calculus ability, allowing you to see the potential drops from enemies on the analyse screen.
Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:Unlocks Baton Pass ability, letting you pass Makoto's turn to other Baton Pass users in battle after a 1 More.
choices: Choice 2: "That was dangerous." +3  /  "You should have known better." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Brainiac Talk ability, giving Makoto the chance to step in and rescue a failed demon negotiation.
choices: Choice 2: "You can change." +3  /  "Don't let it get to you." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Follow Up ability, giving Makoto the chance to attack an enemy after Joker as a follow-up.
choices: Choice 3: "Why do you use it?" +3  /  "That's adorable." +2
Choice 4: "That's an amazing goal." +3  /  "I like a woman in uniform." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
choices: Choice 2: "I got this." +3  /  "Only if I can take it seriously." +2

ranks.text: Requires rank 5 Charm. Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Harisen Recovery ability, which gives Makoto the chance to remove status ailments from party members when in the party.
choices: Choice 1: "Love comes in many forms." +3  /  "We just started." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Shadow Factorization ability, which tells you if an attack will be effective or not while targeting.
choices: Choice 4: "That's a horrible story." +3  /  "He was a noble man." +3  /  "Was it tough without him?" +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Endure ability, giving Makoto a chance to withstand a blow in combat that would usually kill.
choices: Choice 1: "He says that to all the girls." +2  /  "That's how he ropes you in." +2
Choice 2: "Absolutely." +3  /  "What are you going to do?" +2  /  "Eh, she deserves him." +2

ranks.text: This is the point when a romance with Makoto Niijima becomes available. In order to start this rank, you'll need information on the host, Tsukasa. Get this by going to Shinjuku - there's a man outside the bookstore. Talk to him twice. Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Friendship - "You'll find someone someday." +3Romance - "I'll be your study partner."Romance - "I do."Friendship - "That's not what I meant."Unlocks the Protect ability, giving Makoto the ability to shield Joker from an attack that would be fatal.
choices: Choice 4: "I'm a regular here." +3  /  "It's a popular meeting spot." +3  /  "Not as much as you." +2

ranks.text: Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank. Unlocks Second Awakening, evolving Makoto's Persona to its final form, Cybele.

name: Makoto
location: In front of the Student Council Office, or at the school gates.
